tsps

Class TSPS

  • java.lang.Object
    • tsps.TSPS

  • public class TSPS
extends Object
    TSPS Connection: Connects to TSPS app and provides your applet with TSPS People objects as they arrive.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      Hashtable<Integer,TSPSPerson> people
      Hashtable of current People objects.
      TSPSScene scene
      Current TSPScene

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TSPS(PApplet _parent)
      Starts up TSPS with the default port (12000).
      TSPS(PApplet _parent, int port)
      Starts up TSPS with a specific port.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getNumPeople() 
      TSPSPerson[] getPeopleArray()
      Access the current People objects as an array instead of a Hashmap
      void pre() 

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • people

        public Hashtable<Integer,TSPSPerson> people
        Hashtable of current People objects. Accessibly by unique id, e.g. people.get( 0 )

      • scene

        public TSPSScene scene
        Current TSPScene

    • Constructor Detail

      • TSPS

        public TSPS(PApplet _parent)
        Starts up TSPS with the default port (12000). Will also attempt to set up default TSPS events, so will look for three methods implemented in your app: void personEntered( TSPSPerson p); void personUpdated( TSPSPerson p); void personLeft( TSPSPerson p);
        Parameters:
        PApplet - _parent Your app (pass in as "this")

      • TSPS

        public TSPS(PApplet _parent,
            int port)
        Starts up TSPS with a specific port. The port must match what is specified in the TSPS GUI. Will also attempt to set up default TSPS events, so will look for three methods implemented in your app: void personEntered( TSPSPerson p); void personUpdated( TSPSPerson p); void personLeft( TSPSPerson p);
        Parameters:
        PApplet - _parent Your app (pass in as "this")
        int - Port set in TSPS app

    • Method Detail

      • pre

        public void pre()

      • getPeopleArray

        public TSPSPerson[] getPeopleArray()
        Access the current People objects as an array instead of a Hashmap
        Returns:
        Array of TSPSPerson objects

      • getNumPeople

        public int getNumPeople()
        Returns:
        Current number of people
